website_summaries.verdict: Easy to set up, adorable, and boasting a number of ways to interact with just a tap of your smartphone, this camera is a fantastic baby monitor.
pros: Plays lullabies and white noise to help babies fall asleep
cons: There may be a few seconds of delay between the camera and your smartphone

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable baby monitor - would never recommend
customer_reviews.text: Features such as night vision, remote lullaby control and light show control are great. The purpose of the product is to monitor the baby, but the baby arlo is extremely unreliable. It constantly pauses or stops working with the error of “connection problems- make sure the device is connected to the internet and that your Wifi is working properly. “ The length of unusable time ranges from seconds to minutes. Precious seconds for monitoring to make sure your baby is still breathing. It’s not my WiFi connection since the other arlos setup around my house are still monitoring and live.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea with good features, but poorly implemented - buggy and unreliable. If you want a baby monitor that works, this is not the solution for you. Recent app updates have made it less unreliable, but it still crashes on a regular basis. I don't think we've made it more than two nights in a row without waking up to silence because it stopped working at some point during the night.
customer_reviews.author: R. Otis

customer_reviews.title: Lost connection intermittently
customer_reviews.text: Terrible - lost connection throughout the night for the first few nights. Arlo support claimed it was a firmware issue and insisted it would be fixed upon updating to a new version. Once updated, still had the same issue. I’m not alone in this issue - check the Arlo Community boards regarding this product. I sent it back and bought the Nest cam and use it without issues as a baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Avoid (for now anyway)
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this one for now, folks. Constantly disconnects which you can only fix by manually hard reseting. Which requires you to ninja your way into your infant's room to disconnect it from power, switch off the battery, reconnect it, then run the app with the QR code. Waking your kid up. Defeating the purpose of the thing. $200 paperweight until they fix it. Netgear has had these complaints for months and done nothing, apparently. I'm stuck with it, but you should probably move on to a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my memory impaired mother safe!
customer_reviews.text: Using my Arlo Baby cam to keep my mother safe and healthy in her memory care facility. She suffers from dementia and needs to be monitored to stay safe and comfortable. As I live across the country I needed tools to watch over her and even though I had installed Arlo Pro cameras in her room for video and audio surveillance, I still needed to keep an eye on the temperature,humidity and air quality. Se will often adjust the thermostat because she is “cold” and the next thing you know she’s sitting in a 90 degrees environment wondering why she’s uncomfortable. Now I can assess the environment and then call the facility staff to make any necessary adjustments! Thanks Arlo!
customer_reviews.author: Randall C. Manaka

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Echo!!!  Otherwise, great cameras.  Works well on android.
customer_reviews.text: The echo skill has had flaws since it's creation. These cameras will lose connection randomly about 3 minutes during streaming. I had to purchase a fire 8 in order to view these through the app itself. They are really great quality, and easy to use. They are also extremely helpful to be able to LISTEN TO MULTIPLE arlo baby cameras AT THE SAME TIME through the app. This is a huge selling point. It's unfortunate that they won't work with the echo Show, but hopefully this flaw will be fixed in the near future - kinda doubt it, since it has not been working for the 3 years since they first came out though (read online forums).
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great until it dies....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a month before my baby was born. Almost a year to the date of purchase the camera died on me. Plug it in, reset it, switch to battery, switch cords, etc....the camera still won't come on. No amber light, no blue light, nothing. I did notice a week before it completely died that if you tilt the camera downward as far as it could go, the amber light would come on midway for a few seconds. After it did that for a day or two, it completely died. Now that the baby is a little Tasmanian devil running through his nursery ...I need the camera more than ever. Hope you have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Cher C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: So many problems connecting to this to our phones if we are away. It does not always connect and the arlo system seems to go down alot. Tried to call customer service and got the run around for several hours. They said they would call us back the next day at noon and didnt call until 11:30pm! Horrible customer service! Seems to work ok when on the same wifi as the camera but not foolproof if the arlo system goes down you have no camera.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this baby monitor for my second baby and I am loving it! It has every feature that was important to me! I can check on temperature in my baby’s room, clear day and night camera, notifications of movement to my phone so I don’t have to constantly open up my phone and check or wonder if she’s okay, and I paired it to an amazon Alexa video device so I can see her anywhere I have the device connected!! And a big plus.. the rechargeable battery!! Couldn’t be happier. I will be purchasing more Arlo cameras to use through out my home.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Biggest mistake I made was buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Not even 8 months of owning and it disconnects from the internet atleast 3 times in a night, as you can see the video it’s glitches all the time! And I have it on the lowest setting possible as suggested by arlo Support when it first started happening. Looking at getting a better monitor because this camera has some great features but what good is it if it keeps disconnecting and glitching. I bought because I have arlo security cameras and thought it would be nice to have them all on the same app I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hkcody6

customer_reviews.title: Sound doesn’t work on live feed after latest update
customer_reviews.text: The sound simply stopped working after the latest update 6 days ago. I’ve spoken to countless people and have heard enough times “well but the recordings have sound”. Yeah you idiot, now you tell me who buys a baby camera for the recordings? This has been a useless piece of junk for the last 6 days. I had to buy another camera since we use it daily. Regardless of that, I’ve never been a huge fan of this camera. Image quality sucks and gets pixilated all the time (and it’s not my internet). Also there’s sometimes a HUGE delay on the live feed.
customer_reviews.author: AJacques

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last & no panning the camera
customer_reviews.text: There are so many better more affordable cameras then this baby Arlo. You can not pan the camera with the application, you have to do it manually...not cool. You would think that when paying as much as you are for this camera you get more then just the application, camera (that doesn’t move remotely), temperature sensor (which is not accurate, I checked with 3 different thermometers) and humidity detector (which I am doubtful that it doesn’t just connect via WiFi to the local area for that information). The biggest draw back is that you can not pan the camera. The battery doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tina

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues, glitchy picture, and delayed sound
customer_reviews.text: This camera sucks. More than half the time I receive an error message saying I'm not connected. It's plugged into the wall so not a battery issue. I have excellent wifi in my home and no issue with other devices on wifi. When it does actually connect, the picture is grainy and the sound has about a 15 second delay. I hear my kid crying through the wall before the camera catches up. Unfortunately I missed the return window trying to give this camera a chance, so now I'm stuck with an expensive piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality picture, can only be logged in to view on one device at a time.
customer_reviews.text: The only expectation this camera does not meet is not being able to log on to view the screen on more than one device. If you log in while someone else is logged in they will be kicked off. The battery life lasts a little longer than overnight without being plugged in which is longer than any other video monitor we’ve tried. The clarity is awesome, as well as the “white noise”. The speaker in the camera works well. There is a slight delay between your view and real time but not enough to make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: chelsie papineau

customer_reviews.title: Good camera with frustrating additions
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera on the Arlo but the app is frustrating. Each device needs it's own Arlo account, parents can't share and there is only one "primary" account. My wife has the primary on her phone and that's the only one that can talk to our baby through the Arlo. I still haven't figured out how to get Arlo to work with the Alexa in her room either. Overall it is a camera to watch her and the picture and night vision are great which is what we needed. However, I spent extra money for the bells and whistles that i can't get to work.
customer_reviews.author: Paytonmb

customer_reviews.title: Wish I stopped buying Arlo sooner
customer_reviews.text: The device loses connection easily and requires an extensive process to re-sync. The app is horrible and full of glitches and errors that suddenly show all devices offline (I have 5 regular cams and 2 baby cams), and the subscription fee for being a good customer seems to be increasing. Now its a fee per device past 5 cameras, I wish I would have stuck with something cheaper and easier than being suckered into owning more cameras, which is my fault for being a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo Bombara

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT connect to WiFi reliably! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The only reason we bought this camera (in addition to our optics one that we LOVE) was so we could utilize the WiFi option on a trip. We bought it and took it on our trip and the WiFi never worked. I spent over an hour trying everything I could think of. It never connected. Then we brought it home and it won’t connect at home now either. I think it’s too late for me to return it but I’m telling everyone I know to NOT buy the Arlo. Just go with a regular home security camera if you want a wireless option!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brose

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I hate this camera. I wanted to love it so badly. The picture quality and other random features are good but the reason I got it-to be able to monitor my baby-sucks. the sensitivity settings are too sensitive on one level and not sensitive enough on the next, sending inconsistent alerts. I have heard my baby crying on multiple occasions one day with no alerts. Didn’t change the settings and the next day I do get alerts when he cries. Then it randomly logs you out without telling you, so you think your baby is fine and not crying, but in reality you’re just not logged in. Save your money buy a different camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't stay charged!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Arlo Baby camera monitor, as the first one would not stay charged. Unfortunately, the 2nd one had the same issue. The batter wont stay charged and/or charge continuously when connected to the supplied power cord and outlet adapter. I even bought a second charging cable and outlet adapter thinking maybe the first one was defective. Nope, both Arlo Baby Camera's had defective batteries and/or charging ports because the same issue occurred with each unit within 3 months of purchase. I do not recommend this camera and I will be getting a refund to purchase something that actually powers on everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, good range
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best baby monitor we’ve ever had. We were afraid of the range on all other monitors since our sons room is so far away from our room in the house but it works well anyway. The picture and sound quality is GREAT. We have this set up to both our phones, and an iPad. We use the iPad as the monitor screen and just leave it pulled up and plugged in so we have a live feed that doesn’t use up our internet data. It tells us temperature and humidity and let’s us know when that gets out of range. Over all this is a great guy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with great features, App needs a little tweaking
customer_reviews.text: The camera works pretty well. The quality of the image is great. I’d like to see a little tweaking in the app with feature locations and setting changes. For example, when setting a time for the light show, it is difficult to get it set at a specific time, say 15 minutes with the sliding bar, it would be easier if this were a scroll bar like you use for calendars. I’d also like a way to view the camera locally without the need for internet, it seems even when streaming 1080p content locally, it struggles if my internet can’t keep up when I’m on th same internal network as the camera. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: EasyE11

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable, have to restart everyday or even multiple times a day. The delay is a good 5 seconds behind. The sound quality is low and video quality is crap. Can't even use the recording feature. It misses about half of motion and sound notifications.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The Arlo baby monitor is an amazing product. The quality is beyond what I expected. The picture displayed on your phone is in high definition. I not only can use this product to make sure my little one is safe but I also use it when we leave the house to keep and eye on my furr baby. The fact that I can add users to the app and allow my Husband, Mother, and In-Laws watch out does any baby monitor. The night light is convenient and the lullabies are perfect. With just a click on your phone everything is possible quickly and without having to get up. Love this product I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason why it's not sold in stores...
customer_reviews.text: I tried liking it because of all of the features it's supposed to have, but what good are they if they don't work they way it's supposed to? First of all, the picture was ALWAYS choppy, they have an option to change GHz or whatever if you have other cameras and it didn't do anything, and I don't have other cameras.. don't get me started with the fact that I also could never connect from Alexa or remotely, it's not my internet or my wifi, I have an MX10 so that ain't it. Yay for prime! Now I have a Motorola with Hubble app... Works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, until it isn't
customer_reviews.text: We trust watching our baby with the Arlo baby cam. The device has been reliable but comes with a few issues. One, Netgear needs to come out with a monitor. Monitoring on your phone can be cumbersome. We purchased an older Amazon Fire tablet (with the app running) to circumvent this issue and has worked out well. After seven months of usage, the night vision capability stopped which resulted in a dark room and a replacement. This is a well-documented issue on the Baby cam forums and one that should be resolved with firmware or quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Arlo App stops and does not restart
customer_reviews.text: It started off really well. The camera itself is actually fine although I wish I could also move it remotely. But the app just randomly closes or stops reporting sounds in the night. This has caused us not to hear our baby crying for quite some time which is obviously bad. It has just gotten worse and worse with each update. This has occurred with multiple devices with different operating systems. Avoid anything needing to use the arlo app!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Constantly Disconnects
customer_reviews.text: We would love this camera and all of the features if it would actually stay connected and we could view the camera. It disconnects constantly. Multiple times a day. To get it to work again we must restart everything and go through the set up steps all over again. We've used the same camera in multiple places and have had it connected to 4 different wifi sources, and it still constantly disconnects. We tried troubleshooting for too long and it's now just past the return time frame. So for $200, we get to reset this camera 2-3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Miller

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Monitor! Should be on every registry!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive at first because this was my first monitor without a dedicated screen. But I LOVE this monitor! The quality is so clear and the angle is so wide it captures the WHOLE room! It has a ton of options. It takes a bit to get it set up to the exact way you want it with all of the settings, which is why I gave it 4 stars... but once it's set up it's great! We had an old cell phone not in use and have it on there so it's like having a stand alone monitor- the best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.author: The Taylors

customer_reviews.title: If you have a new born, buy this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I like that in addition to video, it also monitors air quality, temperature, humidity, and plays music, allows you to use your portable device to talk live with your baby from the other room (or anywhere). You can add your own music, or record your voice. Works without a cord too for several hours, so use it anywhere! So all that combined with the ability to tailor all the settings, schedule, etc that you've come to expect from the Arlo app! Thanks Arlo!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Joe

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this baby monitor and all Arlo products
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of $200, the battery will not charge and the camera won't turn on. We loved the camera at first but as soon as the warranty window closed the camera stopped working. We exhausted all options from the Arlo troubleshooting page via their website without any luck. Basically they told me sorry we can't help you. If I could give this monitor zero stars I would. Avoid Arlo products unless you feel like wasting your time talking to customer support and not getting any actual support. Worst customer service, and rude staff.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Does not travel!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL for traveling. Like, absolutely terrible. We love the Arlo...when it works...but getting it set up is an absolute nightmare and it’s literally impossible to set up on an external WiFi network (for example, when hotels require a login...Arlo can’t accommodate). We shlepped it all through Europe trying over and over to get it to work. We even tried activating a WiFi hotspot on our phone, but no luck. We were pulling our hair out! And tech support basically told us to file a complaint the second they realized what we were trying to do. I do NOT recommend this u less you plan to set it up once at home and never move it!
customer_reviews.author: MonaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Arlo baby is a good value for what you get. Picture is clear, you don't really miss the being able to move the camera being the picture is so wide. Screen clarity is awesome, the room sensors are a nice option (temp, humidity) baby is due in 3 weeks looking forward to getting use outta this. Only downside I didn't realize when I bought is unless you have a subscription you can not have more than 5 cameras linked to Arlo, so I had to delete one of my exterior house cameras.
customer_reviews.author: steve satz

customer_reviews.title: The swiss arm knife of baby monitors with one problem.
customer_reviews.text: I bough this to replace my baby's previous Coccon Cam monitor when the company when out of business. Arlo is superior to Coccon it almost every way except one. Arlo does a pretty bad job of differentiating between a baby's cry and a normal sound. Now I get notifications on my phone when by dog barks bear her room. I did turn down the sensitivity but it's still not perfect. On the plus side Arlo has a ton of features like different colored lights, music and a long list of other features. It was easy to install and the night vision is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Willson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are currently on separate hawaiian islands, so this camera has helped keep him in the loop with our newborn baby. Despite a short delay (2 seconds or so), the camera quality is great, even at night. The camera also allows him to play lullabies for the baby and speak through the camera. We both access the camera from our iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Putman

customer_reviews.title: Video will freeze while you’re sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the midst of overhauling my entire home network in an effort to get this thing to work. If I find a magic solution, I’ll update my review. But for now, buyer beware, the Arlo Baby is entirely unfit for use as a primary baby monitor. The video constantly freezes and fails to reconnect on it’s own. Often this occurs while we’re asleep, which is especially frustrating. Have already added a second wireless router acting as a network extender closer to the camera and reduced the resolution to the minimum (360p) with no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: B.T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great I had to write a review. It was worth every last penny! The sound quality is great the picture is great it’s all just great! There are different color nightlights built in and music that the device can play. It’s easy to install the app on our phone and to give your spouse access as well. My husband is deployed in the Middle East and from there he is able to log into the app and use the camera perfectly! He gets great picture quality, can talk through it and feel involved from there. I am so happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Amazon devices
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this baby monitor because Amazon and Arlo both say that it works with Amazon devices. The Kindle Fire is suggested as a device to use as a home monitor, however, there is no app for the Kindle. I reached out to Arlo directly and the only response I received was that the app is only available for Apple and Android devices. I will be returning immediately. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: L. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable updates to app. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This WAS a great camera. Once they updated the app, the sound doesn’t work. No sound for a baby monitor is a no go. It’s been about a week since they’ve updated the app and no resolution has been communicated. There’s over a ten second delay with the video feed. If the company doesn’t test updates beforehand and rolls it out, that’s an unreliable product in my eyes. I would never recommend this monitor to anyone for that reason! I paid $200 for a camera to work for a couple of months. Even if they fix all the issues, I’m turned off by the lack of reliability at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Beals

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing this items! The app that comes with the Arlo is inconsistent, crashes often, horrible picture quality at times. I have difficulty connecting to the camera at times so I have to restart the app multiple times and it still doesn’t work. If I were you I would stay away from this until they fix their issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arlo baby: 3-4 second delay, great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our Arlo baby monitor for 6 months and just bought another to use as a nanny cam. The picture quality is great- we love the night vision. Sound is pretty good. It is interesting to have it monitor air quality and temperature. Our first one has about a four second delay from real time and our most recent buy seems to be even a little less than that. It’s not perfect but does what we bought it for. Nightlight feature is fun. We don’t really ever watch the recorded video but love being able to see our LO when he’s home with the nanny and we are working.
customer_reviews.author: M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great baby cam with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: The Arlo is a great baby camera. Really easy setup and user interface with your phone. No need for a separate screen, do everything right on your phone. I can be in the other room or even across the country to see my baby. You can setup motion and sounds alerts so you get a notification on your phone when something is going on. Has a lot of cool features like temperature, air quality and humidity monitoring as well. I highly recommend this camera. It's more on the expensive side but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Major Connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: I have deleted the Arlo Baby off my phone and re connected it about once a month, it works on one phone but then not the other, the app crashes. The battery only lasts a few hours when not plugged in. Terrible buy a bluetooth device.
customer_reviews.author: Mikee

customer_reviews.title: The best baby cam on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've had no glitches as an iOS user like one commenter suggested. I have good internet connectivity in my home which might be a bonus to the overall performance, but this camera has been amazing, exceeding my expectations in terms of quality of the picture, connect-ability and ease of use. I love the extra features in terms of aiur quality and room temperature monitoring. Also love that it records any movements in the app so that I can go back over the day and see what happened. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Micha Lee Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Loading issues
customer_reviews.text: Ok I'm unsure how to rate. When it works, it's great. But I've been having issues where my app won't load and kicks me out or I finally connect but the screen is black. It frustrates me because I want to check on my child without going in his room. Not sure if I'd go with this brand. Like I said when it works good, it's great. Picture quality. Sounds. Night vision. All good. When. It. Works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick notification of movement and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great features. Quick notification times for Sound and movement. I like the sounds options. Air quality monitoring is nice, but the air quality alerts are only useful for creating panic, as they do not offer any specific feedback on what is causing the issue. App times out too much; too much logging in just for background usage. I feel like my settings don’t “stick”. I’ve selected background Audio monitoring a million times, yet it doesn’t stay on. Sometimes buttons are missing (Air settings, sound options, background audio) and I have to tap on the screen or close and reopen the app.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bieker

customer_reviews.title: Very Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Aboslutely love this camera... when it works. We have no internet issues, though that is what Arlo CS likes to blame it on. All other Arlo security cameras function 100% of the time, not the baby monitor, which should ve the one you can rely on the most- since its monitoring your baby. It shows a disconnect error several times a night. Sound randomly stops working or the picture will freeze and you’ll wonder why your toddler hasn’t moved from that spot in 3 hours and has been motionless. I am not the only one who reports having these issues and it never fails that CS blames the customer’s internet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable enough to be your only baby monitor, and no IFTTT support as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great while it's working. Image quality is fantastic, even in night vision mode. Get a backup regular radio monitor for night time, because the Arlo app will frequently stop streaming audio to your phone, and you won't find out until you wake up in the morning (not sure if this is a camera or app problem). The camera also often gets locked up and has to be rebooted (granted, this seems to have improved significantly with recent firmware updates). The product is falsely advertised as working with IFTTT, but in fact it does NOT work with IFTTT and Netgear has made no statements for several years as to whether they ever plan to rectify this.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Anderson

customer_reviews.title: App is unstable and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Arlo recently updated the application and broke critical functionality and was not forthcoming about updates. QA is almost non-existent. This would be fine for something like security cameras. This is not ok for my baby monitor and presents a health risk. Avoid and find other options, especially in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a couple months and are dissatisfied with our purchase. It takes forever to connect to (through the app) and it glitches and turns off a lot (the app), also which is most disturbing if that the screen will freeze! So you think baby is sleeping since the screen shows it but baby is not! Our WiFi signal is great and so it seems to just be technical issues with this device. Looking into returning and getting a non WiFi device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maximum 30 minutes streaming
customer_reviews.text: Arlo has put out a new update which limits streaming from the camera to 30 minutes regardless of whether it is plugged in or on battery. Needless to say this new 'feature' (their reasoning, not mine) makes this camera useless as an overnight baby monitor. Before this update I had intermittent issues maintaining a consistent connection to my bedside Echo Show. Now Arlo is deliberately disconnecting me after only 30 minutes, so please join me in roasting this product a 1-star reviews and perhaps they will revert to a sane baby monitoring feature.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nesseth

customer_reviews.title: The best nanny cam there is
customer_reviews.text: As a parent with two children I’ve been through quite a bit of baby monitors. They all have had their short comings. Not the Arlo baby camera. The arlo baby Camera does it all, and especially well. From monitoring your little one, to getting tempature and humidity readings this camer is amazing. The quality is superb like no other and with its field of view you can see it all. Placement is key here because the camera does not have a rotating head. But placed properly, it’s amazing and by far the most reliable baby cam I’ve ever come across. I sleep better knowing my little ones are sleeping away peacefully and comfortable. Thanks arlo cam.
customer_reviews.author: ReaXion

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty connecting and staying connected
customer_reviews.text: I used this camera with Google Home and Amazon Alexa. Neither integration worked well. I had to reset the Arlo camera often just to connect to the camera to start the stream. It would often disconnect after just a minute or two of streaming to the Google/Amazon display. It worked better with the Mobile App, but this really wasn't an ideal use case. I ended up selling the camera and buying a Ring indoor camera at less than half the price and it works much better. Sure, I don't have the nightlight and music features, but I'd rather be able to stream the camera to my Echo Show.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent performance makes for poor baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Low rating because the camera is unstable. Will sometimes stream perfectly, other times has a long lag, other times will stream audio but video will be distorted or unavailable, and randomly disconnects during streaming. After testing it for more than a year, the inconsistent performance made me uncomfortable using it as an overnight monitor. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent image quality
customer_reviews.text: Image quality (both day and night vision) is very crisp and clear. This is a huge improvement over the Withings/Nokia Home camera that it is replacing. A few areas of improvement: software experience, iOS push notifications with snapshots of the event, increase the number of allowed streams (it's frustrating with multiple users keeping an eye on our son), etc.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mecham

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, garbage software. Worthless as a baby monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: This is a totally worthless device as a baby monitor. I have never seen anything so unreliable - the connection drops constantly despite having an Orbi mesh wifi router in the SAME ROOM as the camera (no more than 6 feet away and line of sight) and a 600 Mbps internet connection. I have 4 Ring cameras that work flawlessly on the same network. It is unconscionable that the company advertises this as a baby monitor when it wouldn't even make a good pet monitor! Completely unreliable software (iOS and Android). Stops working at the drop of a hat with no warning - completely inappropriate as a baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Huckabloon

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a bay monitor
customer_reviews.text: We have this installed as part of a HomeKit enabled home. Works well. Integrated nicely with Homekit, so we can use it though iPhones and iPads anywhere, and even through Apple TV. Loses a star for not being supported via IFTT, even though the rest of the Arlo range of cameras are (this one is oddly excluded). Nightvision on this is outstanding, way better than expected, low light too. However under normal lighting the picture quality is disappointing for 1080p - Heavily compressed and lacking detail.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUYY. RUN AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this piece of crap. Save yourself from hours of frustration. It just doesn’t work!! It may seem to work in the beginning and then you decide to keep it and after few weeks it will really get to you. It cannot do the one thing it’s supposed to do. It just doesn’t record reliably. There is no use having all these features without being reliable. App crashes thousand times. Everyday you need to do a reset multiple times and still it won’t record reliably. This is the worst camera ever. -100 stars. Arlo sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Acustomer

customer_reviews.title: A+ for Arlo!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond obsessed with out Arlo system. We recently moved and relocated our two outdoor cameras and base with no problems. Shortly after our move we realized we were expecting a baby. We have purchased Arlo baby to add to our existing system. We could not be happier with our Arlo systems. I continuously rave and brag on the ease of this system, accessibility and utter stellar performance. I know we can rely on Arlo to keep our family safe and connected and will continue to add to our system!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: 29 Day return date policy on a registry gift??? Didn’t receive gift until after date of return! Smdh
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 Arlo cameras for our sercurity at home. 11 cameras from Arlo Pro, Go and Arlo Pro 2 This baby cam by Arlo is hands down the worst I have ever seen. It WONT CONNECT AT ALL. I’ve gone through all forums and all the customer support online through netgear- Which sucks worse- but no one can get these things to connect, and the ones that do, the picture quality lags so badly. I expected so much more out of netgear!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but room to improve
customer_reviews.text: I already had an arlo system when I purchased this camera, so it was extremely easy to set it up with my existing system. There are times though when it will randomly lose the wifi signal and it has to find it again, those times usually don't last longer than a minute or two, but it is frustrating. Night vision is incredible, also love the fact that it has a night light and lullabies for my little dude. Picture quality is top notch and the battery life really does last 6 hours when it's not plugged in. It's a great baby monitor for sure, but there are just some quirks that prevent me from rating it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DenverDad

customer_reviews.title: Overall good; minor design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good camera. Video quality is good, app is fine. My only complaints are, 1)the cord does not plug into the USB transformer from the top, so it sticks way out from the wall (not sure why manufacturers can't fix this easy thing that aggravates a lot of people), 2)when the cord gets damaged, you can't buy a Netgear/Arlo replacement, and 3) the battery switch is very subtle. It isn't marked on/off, but there is some light shading under the slider so you have to know if the color is showing, it is running on battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Connection Often Fails - Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great and so is the feature set. But, that doesn't matter if you can't connect. We have super fast 400mbps WiFi and Arlo often fails to connect. We lowered the video quality down to 320p (the lowest) and it helped but it still fails too often to be useful. Arlo Baby is basically useless to us. Also, I just learned that a lot of the positive reviews are fake. You can tell by going to fakepost.com or by using the fakepost chrome extension. They get an F grade, which means pretty much none of the positive reviews are legit. If I had known before we never would have bought and you shouldn't either.
customer_reviews.author: Sorkness

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: I never leave a review but after using this monitor for over a year now I feel compelled to warn everyone to NOT buy this product. It is UNSAFE for your baby if you own this product. It is terrible in every imaginable aspect. The connection constantly goes away and the camera fails half the time to notify me that my son is crying or moving. It is so unreliable it’s now in a box in storage. The whole app is janky, and it has gotten worse with time. I know this issue is not my wifi given I upgraded to the fastest speeds and the camera is still worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, so inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY. Have the arlo baby and it loses WIfI connection daily. It's not an issue of signal, have ample wifi coverage and it doesn't matter if the device is right next to my router. The system will drop connection for hours at a time. Always circle saying "connecting". Total garbage. Prime time nap time today, monitor crashed and burned again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The hardware/software is easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Build quality and performance is top-notch. The hardware/software is easy to setup and use, and sharing to people is incredibly easy. It would be nice to have longer clips. One drawback is most times action triggers turn the camera on too late, for example, even though it detects movement, nothing can be seen on the captured video clip.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul

customer_reviews.title: Night vision doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, night vision does not work properly. I contacted arlo support and after jumping through hoops, I’m now going on a month or longer back and forth with e-mails through their support team to get the device replaced. When they do replace the device I have to pay for shipping (16.99), other than night vision issue the video quality is not poor but not the best. The battery is insufficient, cannot leave it without the charger for more than 4 hours. The device doesn’t come with a hand held viewing monitor, so it always needs to be on a phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and even easier to use with the app. Decent quality audio and sound even when not at home. Free cloud storage is a big plus. Only big downside is notifications. Would be nice if you could turn notifications on or off per account. Also to be able to adjust the frequency of the notifications or be able to dismiss them. Yes the baby was crying. And still is while being changed, but I do not need Arlo to keep informing me with notifications every 20 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Aquasage

customer_reviews.title: The absolute worst part of this camera is the lag though
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this camera. First off the colored night light NEVER worked on my unit.. so it came to me defective. I emailed customer support but never heard back from them. The night vision is a joke. I could see my baby easier when it was turned off. The absolute worst part of this camera is the lag though. It's easily 4 seconds behind - which means I got to hear my baby cry not only in real-time.. but 4 seconds later via this camera as well! I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Art with Mrs. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Hacked
customer_reviews.text: Our monitor was hacked and someone was able to control the sounds and the night light, which you can only do if you have access to the monitor itself or the app on a phone... it was not me or my husband. We turned out monitor off right away and will never turn it back on. Since posting this on social media I’ve learned it’s a common occurrence and people back WiFi based monitors like arlo often to watch or scare the children on the other end (you can play noises/sounds and talk through the monitor). Will never recommend arlo or any other WiFi based monitor to anyone after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Haley S

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as a NestCam
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these to try as a replacement for our NestCam. The Arlo app is lacking one key feature for my wife and I: being able to scrub through the time line and effectively get a time lapse. The timeline scrub in nest is key for us to quickly see what’s been happening or how the babies slept, we’ve caught several hilarious incidents of sleep talking and walking this way. Since the Arlo app is so poor, I was also disappointed to learn homekit support isn’t available for other Arlo products if I wanted to replace my other NestCams.
customer_reviews.author: chris bandy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful video quality but horrible baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great...when it connects. It has disconnected in the middle of the night while we were sleeping with no warning. Also, it won’t connect during the day at random times. Arlo needs to take this off the market as a baby monitor or sell a separate handheld monitor that doesnt require WiFi to work. Got this well before our daughter was born but didn’t use it until we transitioned her into her own room. Now it’s too late to return. We had to purchase an audio only monitor to use in conjunction with the Arlo Monitor so when it disconnects while we’re asleep we still have a back up. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month. Camera won't charge, battery holds a charge, won't power on without the battery. I contacted the manufacturer, since it's under warranty, but it's like being in Dante's Inferno. I have opened 3 support tickets, somehow its impossible to get help via them, replies don't work, and I'm on with a live agent and have spent 2+ hours with them, with an infant screaming at me. They just offered me a new USB cable. I've tried many usb cables. The problem is with the camera. Seriously. I simply cannot recommend anyone buy this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera, good features
customer_reviews.text: Came from a different cam that wasn't as baby-focused. I've been impressed with the quality of the hardware, as well as the add-on features like LED light, music, and environment sensors. The iOS app is also well-designed and easy to use. We have had some issues with the video and audio stream stopping when moving within the house, but killing the app and re-launching almost always resolves it. Overall, it's a good product and I would recommend to friends who need a new monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Nick O.

customer_reviews.title: Broke upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Christmas before my granddaughter was born, we didn't test it until months later after she was born and it never worked. What a waste of money. Oh, and we have the whole Arlo security camera system as well, one camera they replaced because it also never worked but now less than a year later another one is out. Save your money, buy cameras and systems that actually work for more than a few months (or at all).
customer_reviews.author: HDS

customer_reviews.title: Great product as any camera type or use
customer_reviews.text: so far this is stellar as a camera or monitor of any sort- security, baby- whatever you would want to use it for- it has great features like air and temp monitors- as well as the ability to charge the battery and move it, unlike a nest cam. It also connects to apple homekit amazingly!! you can tell siri to show you(whatever you name your camera) and it pops right up... this is great so far, as with any wifi cam- there is a tiny delay so be aware if primary use as baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great Child monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was using a Arlo pro in my kids room before I installed the baby version. This one is much clearer and the live stream definitely starts up quicker then the pro. I like the extra features, especially the music functionality which we use all the time. Highly recommended if you are currently using one of the regular Arlos as a baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Hiepnotiq

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a pretty decent baby monitor.. does fancy things like detect moisture, air quality, and temperature. However, my favorite feature is allowing the sound to go through your phone with the screen off. Works for all of my android devices. I've also been able to get it to cast on my google home nest hub, somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Constant disconnecting in the night
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not buy this baby monitor. The one thing a baby monitor should be is reliable but this thing disconnects constantly. I have Google WiFi in my home and routinely wake up in the night to find my monitor disconnected with no ability to reconnect it. The app just sits there with a message saying “connecting...”. This is extremely concerning for a product used to make sure your child is ok in the night because anything could go wrong and you’d have no idea.
customer_reviews.author: esetnik

customer_reviews.title: I'm a software engineer, and couldn't fix this camera.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty techy, and the limited interface and options of the camera really hinders your ability to fix any issues it has. We tried to setup this camera, I've set up a lot of home security systems of commercial to residential quality, so I assume a baby camera should be a simple task. Well that's wrong, I could not get this to connect to WiFi at first. Eventually it finally connected, had video for a couple hours, then disconnected. That was the end of it. Tried everything I could to get it working again, ended up throwing it in the trash. Definitely not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: bennett yeates

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, drains battery
customer_reviews.text: Great quality images, very easy to visualize the child even at a distance. It is extremely sensitive even at the lowest setting. Which is great when monitoring the baby but tough when you are trying to sleep at night! Drains battery very quickly on both monitor and your cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: It's ok ish now.
customer_reviews.text: We first got this camera and it connected fairly quickly then after a couple weeks it dropped to taking 10 minutes+ to connect. I was super annoyed but a couple weeks ago they seem to have fixed things, it connects almost instantly. This monitor is overkill though and I wish we had gone with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hake

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: We set this camera up this week after purchasing in December as our baby just arrived. Now too late to return, the camera is terrible. Always disconnecting from the stream and if it is connected, it’s lagging and jumping to catch up. I do not feel safe using this terrible camera as a baby monitor. On top of that, it was a pain in the butt to set up. My husband and I are both tech savvy, and we were so frustrated by the process. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Patterson

customer_reviews.title: No worries
customer_reviews.text: I read sooooooo many reviews from so many cameras. This is my third child and never had all the options there are today. I was very hesitant but decided to go for it. Baby is actually due tomorrow. I’ve had camera installed for days streamed to an old iPad all day with whole picture view constant streaming and had no problem. Three different phones constant viewing no problem. Picture is great. So far so good I’m glad I decided to go with this one. Will update if anything changes just because I’ve read so many other reviews lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dirka Dirka

customer_reviews.title: When it actually works it's very nice
customer_reviews.text: The features of the camera are amazing. Full HD video, play music, talk through the device to the baby, and a night light. However, connecting to the camera to view it with your smart device is unreliable at best, and generally the device does not connect. So, you will just get frustrated and walk into the room to see what is happening rather that wait several minutes for it not to connect at all. We ended up buying another product with it's own parent unit so we always have a reliable connection. Hoped for so much better with this since we have Arlo cameras on the house for security. The cameras are good, but avoid the baby camera.
customer_reviews.author: Allise

customer_reviews.title: Crappy.
customer_reviews.text: It was all good at first but then it went all downhill after a couple of months of using it. I dont know why there's a battery because even when it remains plugged in 24/7 the battery manages to die and the camera fails to work. I have to constantly reconnect back to my network and most times the "power switch" does not work. The thing only works when it wants to. I reached out about the battery dying to Arlo because it's still in warranty but of course it starts working again and case closed. Then it starts acting up again. Very disappointed in this product especially with being a first time mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: HATE this baby camara! I've had ussues since the minute i got it! And now its inly been 3 and a half months and for some reason i cannot connect my camara to the app! I KNOW its not my internet because i just updated on that just for this matter and still does not work! I've reset the camara, i've deleted the app and redownloaded and still nothing! Its very frustrating! Dont waste ur money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine medina

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait?
customer_reviews.text: Better than my previous baby monitor. At first I thought I would miss the ability to pan around the room, but with the wide angle lens, I have no issues seeing the entire room. The clarity is great, I have more customization and my daughter enjoys picking what color she wants before bed time. I have already purchased a second monitor for my other kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R. Schwank

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and bad support
customer_reviews.text: The product simply doesn't work, and since we have received it we have spent weeks on the phone with support. They do not answer calls on the weekend, and it takes an extraordinary effort to get through to customer service during the week. There is no easy way to get out of hours-long queue, and the help is minimal once someone does get on the line - not much more than reading comments on this site. Basic troubleshooting doesn't work, and even sending a replacement product hasn't worked. We have a well wired home with plenty of tech but this device - and the unresponsive, uncaring tech support - make this one of the worst purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: I find the Arlo baby monitor to be a flawless camera. I have only had it installed for a week, but it has provided the needed motion and sound for monitoring my child. I find the settings to be easy to navigate and I like the functionality of using it with my Amazon Echo Show 5.
customer_reviews.author: DMY

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well as baby monitor...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as baby monitor. Is a great camera and audio 2 way but the alerts you get when baby crying are pop up banners...if your baby is crying you won’t get an alert to wake up up in the night or hear your child
customer_reviews.author: JRo

customer_reviews.title: Fine, wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Biggest (possibly only) pro is being able to check in on your kiddo from anywhere, if you're not home with them. Negatives: 1) you always need your phone on you to watch the monitor. I know it's touted, too, that you can keep it on throughout the night with sound on and picture off. This never worked reliably for me at all. 2) it's worthless to travel with. Truly, just don't try it. You need to fully go through the entire set up process to attempt this, but we've actually never been successful.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality software, unsafe, hardware made in China breaks on first use
customer_reviews.text: The USB cable just fell apart when unplugging it. The picture quality is not 1080p. It's very poor. Does it matter if some Hong starts 1080pnif you compress it to the point its just a blocky stream of artifacts? On Android, their app just closes. Crashes. You're supposed to be monitoring your child. You wake up, and their app has closed itself.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Evans

customer_reviews.title: battery died in 6 months and support is not helping
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Arlo Baby camera back in July 2019. All was good for a few months, but then battery started to deteriorate, and in January, it only held the charge for 20 minutes. In February, it didn't hold the charge at all. I've exchanged multiple emails with Arlo support and was told that they could send me a refurbished camera as a replacement. But then it appeared that I was talking with support in Europe, and they cannot send a replacement for a device purchased in the US. I have no idea why I was talking to European support, and they didn't help me to contact US support. Deeply disappointed with the device and Arlo client support.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: App issues.
customer_reviews.text: The app disconnects and you are no longer connected without warning. No issue with picture quality or anything like that. But I was in the kitchen and heard my baby having an absolute meltdown across the house and checked the app. It was frozen on "connecting". It happens pretty often. To the extent that I have a cheapo audio monitor as back up, which is unreasonable for a product that costs this much.
customer_reviews.author: Holly E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have outdoor Arlo cameras that we have been using for some time in the house instead of the baby camera. We were happy but once we got the baby camera, we realized the huge difference - the baby camera is amazing! The quality of the video is much better than the outside cameras; it includes a light that can be turned on and off with the app and changes the color; it includes stats about room temperature and humidity. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JD3

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% reliable
customer_reviews.text: While the camera does work well the systems reliability is lacking from what I would expect as a baby monitor. About once a week we have to reset the camera for wifi issues, the app struggles if multiple devices are connected and sometimes the app just stops working on your phone or Alexa. After 6 months of use I would not recommend this monitor. The reliability might be good enough for a security camera but not for a baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Blake T

customer_reviews.title: Would be good if it had a stable app
customer_reviews.text: The app is plagued by infuriating bugs. When it works though, it is excellent. But for example as a baby monitor - sometimes when listening in "sound only" mode, the app stops working. You think you will be able to hear your child if they make a sound, but nope. You'll only know it stopped working if there is a noise machine in the room that you suddenly aren't hearing. That's just one of about 5 bugs that happen every single day...
customer_reviews.author: R. Weston

customer_reviews.title: I love how I can connect to my Apple TV!
customer_reviews.text: We love how we can connect with our Apple TV and stream live footage of our son while I can get things done around the house. No need to carry my phone or a monitor around everywhere, I can simply just glance at my tv! The picture quality is wonderful! We are looking into getting the whole Arlo camera system for all around our house!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this monitor unless...
customer_reviews.text: 1. you like constantly looking at a connecting screen on your app when you just wanna see or hear baby 2. You like missing night feeds because the monitor decided to disconnect in the middle of the night while you are sound asleep. 3. You like constantly needing to force close the app to desperately trying to make the thing work 4. You want to spend money on a second old fashion monitor because you can’t trust the Arlo in the middle of the night. If you like constantly cussing out electronics this is the monitor for you. If not keep searching because this is the utter most unreliable piece of technology I have ever spent my money on.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fast

customer_reviews.title: Worst App Ever
customer_reviews.text: The hardware of this device is fine. The app on your phone is quite possibly the worst app I’ve ever used. Doesnt matter what device (iPad or iPhone), Constantly, and I mean every day, it shuts off in the middle of the night which defeats the purpose of monitoring your baby. The app, 9 out of 10 times will not load the video feed until I force close or even restart my phone. I would recommend this to NOBODY... worst purchase of all the things we bought as first time parents. Absolute frustrated beyond bellies with the app that I felt I needed to line a review when normally I never would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
